ruleset.name: 命名規則など議論の余地がある部分を検出するチェック
ruleset.description: キャメルケースなど議論の余地のある部分を検出するルール

rule.name: Superglobals
rule.message: 「{0}」はスーパーグローバル変数「{1}」にアクセスします
rule.description: Accessing a super-global variable directly is considered a bad practice. These variables should be encapsulated in objects that are provided by a framework, for instance.

rule.name: CamelCaseClassName
rule.message: {0}クラスはCamelCaseでは名前が付けられていません。
rule.description: It is considered best practice to use the CamelCase notation to name classes.

rule.name: CamelCasePropertyName
rule.message: プロパティ「{0}」の名前はcamelCaseでは指定されていません。
rule.description: It is considered best practice to use the camelCase notation to name attributes.

property.name: allow-underscore
property.description: Allow an optional, single underscore at the beginning.

property.name: allow-underscore-test
property.description: Is it allowed to have underscores in test method names.
